contract.href: reference/contract/Cost-Plus Addendum to White Doe Inn Kitchen Remodel Contract.pdf

tasks.name: Finish Trim
tasks.notes: Trim joints should be finished with Bondo for wood, not wood filler and definitely not caulk.

subtasks.name: Trim Passthrough
subtasks.notes:
1. Casing must be same thickness all around for equipment install. 
2. Inside casing is 3/4". 
3. Outside casing is 1/2" - need to plane 3/4" to 1/2" (Dave to provide planer). 
4. Trim height is 35 7/8" - can be cut to 30" to fit opening. Kat to reach out to Crest Mechanical. 
5. Opening width is 47 3/4" - can be trimmed for tighter fit (site opening is 49").

subtasks.name: Adjust Hallway Opening Heights
subtasks.notes:
1. Kitchen to storage: 4 1/2" from ceiling in small storage room to finished opening height. 
2. Storage to back door: 4 1/2" from ceiling from pantry side to finished opening height. 
3. Locations marked in pencil on openings, left side at top.

subtasks.name: Kitchen Crown Molding
subtasks.notes:
1. Need to figure out how to handle the sagging joist (Can handle it by floating the ceiling from chase to the dip over the door.) 
2. Registers in laundry and storage room may be too low for crown molding. 
3. Need to verify once crown is on site. 
4. HVAC can be scheduled for 1/22 or 1/23 - confirmed we cannot adjust the registers ourselves from Joclar & Fields.

subtasks.name: Kitchen Main Door Casing
subtasks.notes: 1. Light switch is so close to casing - need to case around light switch. 2. Need reveal on door casing (currently flush) - reveal should match standard reveal (e.g., match windows reveal).

subtasks.name: Install Baseboard in Scupernong
subtasks.notes: Requires Scupernong drywall and paint complete first.

subtasks.name: Change header trim over triple window to match other window
Main Kitchen Door
subtasks.notes: 1. Hinges to be delivered 1/22. 2. Door is in the garage.

subtasks.name: Install Back Door
subtasks.notes: 1. Door is in the garage. 2. Install with Antique Bronze hinges. 3. Install existing antique bronze electronic deadbolt and door knob provided by owner.

subtasks.name: HVAC Door
subtasks.notes: 1. Install existing 32" door with jamb. 2. Same casing as main kitchen door.

tasks.name: Build Back Deck with Ramp
tasks.notes: Need to sort out details for dimensions, rail system vs. no rail system, etc. REQUEST: GC meet with owner to plan.

tasks.name: Remove Old Porch Steps and Posts
HVAC Lower Registers
tasks.notes: Registers in laundry and storage room may be too low for crown molding. Also available 1/23 if needed.
tasks.comments: 1. 2026-01-21: Cancelled - Registers will work but barely - using low profile registers instead

tasks.name: Crest Prep / Cleaning
tasks.notes: Clean and prep kitchen area before Crest arrives. Clear tools and materials, protect flooring.

tasks.name: Crest Installation
tasks.notes: Need to confirm exact delivery time and duration for install.

subtasks.name: Install Existing Handsink in Laundry Room
subtasks.notes: Not part of Crest order.

tasks.name: Kitchen Baseboard
tasks.notes: Must be complete before Crest install on 1/27.

subtasks.name: Move Receptacle Over Mop Sink
subtasks.notes: Move to left of hand sink.

subtasks.name: Install Receptacle for Light Strings
subtasks.notes: For light strings that criss-cross to firepit.

subtasks.name: Add Receptacle for TV Over Passthrough
Connect Passthrough Heat Lamp
subtasks.notes: Must be done after Crest installation. Heat lamp is part of passthrough equipment.

tasks.name: Propane
tasks.notes: Dave coordinating and responsible. Dependency for siding install.

subtasks.name: Install Propane Line for Gas Range
subtasks.notes: 1. Installed in secure box in wall to right of existing stainless steel wall covering. 2. Must be installed before remaining stainless is installed on Friday 1/23.

subtasks.name: Propane Line Remediation
subtasks.notes: Dave coordinating and responsible. Dependency for siding install.

tasks.name: Install Stainless Wall Covering (Right of Range)
tasks.notes: Cannot be before Dion finishes range propane install.

subtasks.name: Paint Kitchen
subtasks.notes: Requires finish-drywall-1 complete first.

subtasks.name: Paint Scupernong
subtasks.notes: Requires finish-drywall-2 complete first.

subtasks.name: Paint Doors (Kitchen Main, Back, HVAC)
subtasks.notes: Paint after door installation (1/24). 3 doors total.

subtasks.name: Drywall patch two light holes in Scupernong

tasks.name: Install Dryer Vents
tasks.notes: Cut holes from laundry room to outside for dryer vents.

materialDependencies.name: Upper Cabinets
materialDependencies.orderLink: Cabinets to go arriving Thurs Jan 22

tasks.name: Project Finish
tasks.notes: Final punch acceptance criteria: All work complete per contract scope, all inspections passed, all equipment operational, no safety hazards, cosmetic defects documented and remediated.

subtasks.name: Schedule Final Punch Walkthrough
subtasks.notes: Coordinate with owner for walkthrough date/time.

subtasks.name: Final Punch Walkthrough
subtasks.notes: Owner walks job with GC to identify any remaining items. Document all punch items.

subtasks.name: Punch List Remediation
subtasks.notes: GC addresses all documented punch items.

subtasks.name: Final Acceptance
subtasks.notes: Owner confirms all punch items resolved. Project complete.

tasks.name: Install HVAC Registers
tasks.notes: Need to check with Chad if he's providing and installing these

subtasks.name: Adjust kitchen to pantry hallway opening
Adjust pantry to back door hallway opening
